<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Histrionic Injury](/Feats.aspx?ID=3346) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Poppet" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=418" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 64</row>

**Frequency**
once per hour

**Trigger**
A creature you can see damages you with a melee Strike.

</column>

---

You respond with a startled look, dramatic pratfall, or theatrical arm-flailing that stymies your attacker. The attacker must succeed at a Will saving throw against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher, or become [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) for 1 round (stupefied 2 on a critical failure).
name: Histrionic Injury
